solution_line_template: Rent plus utilities for the whole apartment is {rent}+{utilities} = $<<{rent}+{utilities}={rent_plus_utilities}>>{rent_plus_utilities}

If one roommate pays ${one_roommate_payment} in all, the total cost of everything is {one_roommate_payment}*{num_roommates} = <<{one_roommate_payment}*{num_roommates}={total_cost_everything}>>{total_cost_everything}
